title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.label: What design and development services do you offer?
questions.content: The services I offer include user-friendly web design, frontend development, responsive (mobile-friendly) design, UI/UX design, developing interactive features for web applications, and performance optimization. Additionally, I create digital identities for brands and present their visual designs professionally.

questions.label: What steps do you follow in your design process?
questions.content: My design process generally consists of three main stages: research, design, and testing. In the first stage, I shape the project by conducting user needs analysis, market research, and competitor analysis. In the second stage, I create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs, gathering client feedback. In the final stage, I test the feasibility of the design and continuously improve the user experience.

questions.label: Which technologies do you use in web and mobile projects?
questions.content: For web projects, I typically use modern technologies like React.js, Vue.js, and Tailwind CSS. These technologies allow me to develop fast, scalable, and user-friendly projects. For mobile projects, I use React Native to create high-performance, native-like experiences for both iOS and Android platforms. Additionally, I quickly adapt to emerging frontend and mobile technologies, constantly researching new tools and frameworks to strengthen my projects with the latest innovations.

questions.label: Do you offer custom solutions tailored to your target audience?
questions.content: Yes, I customize each project based on the needs of the target audience. Focusing on user experience and functionality, I develop aesthetically pleasing and functional solutions that meet the expectations of the visitor group. In design, I make improvements based on user feedback to make each project more focused and effective.

questions.label: What features are included in your web and mobile projects?
questions.content: My web and mobile projects are designed and developed to comply with user-friendly accessibility standards. They are optimized for search engines with SEO-friendly configurations and ensure fast loading times. I pay attention to performance, security, and data protection in both web and mobile projects.

questions.label: How are your service prices determined?
questions.content: Prices are determined based on the scope, complexity, and requirements of the project. Since each project is different, each requires a unique proposal and pricing process. After reviewing the project details, I provide the most suitable price for you.

questions.label: Do you charge on a project basis or hourly?
questions.content: I offer both project-based and hourly pricing options. Project-based pricing is suitable for tasks with a specific scope and delivery time. Hourly pricing can be preferred for more flexible projects or ongoing work.

questions.label: Do your prices change?
questions.content: Prices may change depending on the scope and requirements of the project. There may be adjustments in pricing if additional requests or project expansions occur. However, I always inform and get approval from the client in advance regarding any price changes.

questions.label: Why did you choose to work in frontend development and design?
questions.content: I love improving and appreciating beauty. I wanted to combine this with my analytical skills in software, and the combination of these two areas allows me to create both aesthetic and functional solutions.

questions.label: What is the most rewarding project in your career?
questions.content: It's hard to point to just one project; however, there are several projects whose interfaces I designed, and millions of people use these interfaces every month. This makes me very proud. Additionally, the impact of the voluntary 'conscience' projects I've worked on, which have touched thousands of people, is always a source of pride for me.

questions.label: Which technologies would you like to explore personally?
questions.content: Personally, I would like to delve deeper into user experience and visual design. Additionally, I am eager to explore emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning. Learning how these technologies can be integrated into software development to further improve user experiences could be an exciting opportunity.

questions.label: How do you spend your time outside of work?
questions.content: I usually spend my time reading and researching philosophical topics, human relations, metaphysics, and space. I also find peace through my religious practices.

questions.label: What are your future goals?
questions.content: My future goal is to build the biggest projects and companies in my field and serve humanity.
